mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_country (country_code, user_id, priority_ord) VALUES (#{countryCode}, #{userId}, #{priorityOrd})
mapper.select: SELECT uc.country_code AS countryCode, c.code_nm AS countryName, uc.priority_ord AS priorityOrd FROM user_country uc LEFT JOIN code c ON c.code_ty = 'COUNTRY' AND c.code = uc.country_code WHERE uc.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY uc.priority_ord ASC
